title: Greetings and Introductions
content:
# Greetings in Spanish

## Common Phrases
- Hola - Hello
- Buenos días - Good morning
- Buenas tardes - Good afternoon
- Buenas noches - Good night
- ¿Cómo estás? - How are you?
- Muy bien, gracias - Very well, thank you

## Practice Exercises
1. Greet someone in the morning
2. Ask someone how they are
3. Respond to "¿Cómo estás?"

title: Numbers 1-20
content:
# Numbers in Spanish (1-20)

## Numbers List
1. uno - 1
2. dos - 2
3. tres - 3
...up to
20. veinte - 20

## Practice Exercises
1. Count from 1 to 20
2. Write numbers in words
3. Match numbers with their Spanish names

title: Basic Verbs
content:
# Essential Spanish Verbs

## Common Verbs
- ser/estar - to be
- tener - to have
- ir - to go
- hacer - to do/make

## Practice Exercises
1. Conjugate "ser" in present tense
2. Use "tener" in simple sentences
3. Create basic phrases with these verbs
